mapper.sql: SELECT u.*, a.id AS account_id, a.user_id AS account_user_id, a.sn AS account_sn, a.domain AS account_domain, a.name AS account_name, a.type AS account_type, a.status AS account_status, a.created_at AS account_created_at, a.updated_at AS account_updated_at FROM itsnow_msc.users u LEFT JOIN itsnow_msc.accounts a ON u.account_id = a.id
SELECT cu.msp_user_id FROM itsnow_msc.contract_users cu LEFT JOIN itsnow_msc.contracts c ON cu.contract_id = c.id LEFT JOIN itsnow_msc.accounts a ON c.msu_account_id = a.id
mapper.select: WHERE UPPER(u.username) = UPPER(#{username}) AND UPPER(a.sn) = UPPER(#{accountSn})
WHERE UPPER(u.username) = UPPER(#{username}) AND ( UPPER(a.sn) = UPPER(#{accountSn}) OR u.id in ( WHERE a.sn = #{accountSn}) )
SELECT DISTINCT u.* FROM itsnow_msc.contracts c LEFT JOIN itsnow_msc.users u ON c.msp_account_id = u.account_id WHERE c.msu_account_id = #{id}
SELECT u.* FROM itsnow_msc.users u LEFT JOIN itsnow_msc.accounts a ON u.account_id = a.id WHERE a.id = #{id} OR u.id in ( WHERE a.id = #{id})

SELECT u.* FROM itsnow_msc.contract_users cu LEFT JOIN itsnow_msc.contracts c ON cu.contract_id = c.id LEFT JOIN itsnow_msc.users u ON cu.msp_user_id = u.id WHERE c.msu_account_id = #{accountId} AND cu.access = '1'
